quizzes.question: Which of the following is not a supported file access mode for the fopen function?
quizzes.textContent:
[h1]Appending to a File[/h1]

If you want to append content to a file, you need to open the file in [b]append mode[/b].

[b]For example:[/b] [code format="php"]$myFile = "test.txt";
[b]$fh = fopen($myFile, 'a');[/b]
fwrite($fh, "Some text");
fclose($fh);[/code]
[note]When appending to a file using the [b]'a' mode[/b], the file pointer is placed at the end of the file, ensuring that all new data is added at the end of the file.[/note]
